id.description: Unique team id, always equal to the team_number.

key.description: Most specific team name, simply frc#### where #### is the team number

name.description: Long FRC Team Name (note, this can be VERY long, short_name or nickname is recommended)

nickname.description: Team Nickname, e.g. Shaker Robotics or Cheesy Poofs

frs_url.description: URL redirecting to a viewable page of this resource.
